title: Grant-Kohrs Ranch National Historic Site: Our Staff & Offices
body: Our Staff & Offices       Division of Administration  Jacqueline Lavelle, Superintendent (406) 846-2070 ext. 221 Andrew Getts, Administrative Officer (406) 846-2070 ext. 222 Catherine Skinner, Administrative Support Assistant, (406) 846-2070 ext. 224  Division of Maintenance  Alan Stewart, Facility Manager (406) 846-2070 ext. 240 Willy King, Maintenance Mechanic (406) 846-2070 ext. 237 Mike Oestreich, Exhibit Specialist (406) 846-2070 ext. 223 Ron Knudson, Maintenance Mechanic Helper (406) 846-2070 ext. 237 Jeff Trueblood, Laborer (406) 846-2070 ext. 237   Division of Natural and Cultural Resources  Chris Ford, Integrated Resource Program Manager (406) 846-2070 ext. 242 Jason Smith, Natural Resource Specialist (406) 846-2070 ext. 232 Ely Indreland, Range Technician (406) 846-2070 ext. 241 Allen Tate, Irrigator (406) 846-2070 ext. 229 Vacant, Museum Technician (406) 846-2070 ext. 243  Division of Interpretation & Visitor Services    Julie Croglio, Chief of Interpretation & Education (406) 846-2070 ext. 226 Lori Jensen, Park Ranger (406) 846-2070 ext. 227 Chance Reynolds, Education Technician (406) 846-2070 ext. 230 Austin Bousquet, Park Guide (406) 846-2070 ext. 302  Superfund  Jeffrey Johnson, CERCLA Project Manager (406) 846-2070 ext. 231
